title: Front Open Space / Margin / Setback - means the distance between the boundary line of plot abutting the means of access / road / street and the building line
clause_text: Front Open Space / Margin / Setback - means the distance between the boundary line of plot abutting the means of access / road / street and the building line. In case of plots facing two or more means of accesses / roads / streets, the plot shall be deemed to front on all such means of accesses / roads / streets.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Front Open Space / Margin / Setback - means the distance between the boundary line of plot abutting the means of access / road / street and the building line. In case of plots facing two or more means
